repast.simphony.visualization.gis3D.style

Interface SurfaceShapeStyle<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the agent type
    All Superinterfaces:
    StyleGIS<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSurfaceShapeStyle

    public interface SurfaceShapeStyle<T>
extends StyleGIS<T>
    Interface for surface shapes (lines, polygons) in the 3D GIS display.
    Author:
    Eric Tatara
